categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Amos was a male individual who served as a captain within the naval forces of the Galactic Empire. Amos was in command of a fleet that protected Desevro, and led it from his flagship, the ISD Tormentor. The fleet was ultimately destroyed due to Amos' carelessness, and he perished when the Tormentor was destroyed in a battle above Desevro.
